testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read what our customers say about us

0.text: Quick, friendly, and at a good price. I needed a van quickly for a photography event. It didn't fit in my car, so I was very happy to be able to rent a van 2 days in advance!
0.name: Sara Chakib

1.text: Very good, smooth, and professional service at a very good price!!! The place to be for maintenance and repairs!!
1.name: Fahd El Uazani

2.text: Good service, pleasant to drive the Box Van, friendly owner, in short a strong recommendation to rent here.
2.name: Ronny Van Gucht

3.text: Nothing to complain about, both for pickup and return. And of course, I got my deposit back.
3.name: Yassin Deneef

4.text: Top rental! One of the best in Antwerp for sure! High-quality vans. 5 stars.
4.name: Moussa Elboualati

intro.description1: We use modern equipment to see exactly what's wrong with your car
intro.description2: Electrical or mechanical? We check everything. You'll get a clear picture of the situation and what we can do.

computer.title: Car Repair
computer.description: Reading and analyzing error codes from all computers

engine.title: Engine Diagnostic
engine.description: Complete analysis of engine performance and anomalies

battery.title: Battery Test
battery.description: Checking the battery status and charging system

ac.title: Air Conditioning
ac.description: Diagnosis of the air conditioning system and leak detection

cost.question: How much does a diagnostic cost?
cost.answer: The cost of the diagnostic varies depending on the type of intervention. We inform you of our rates before intervening.

duration.question: How long does a diagnostic take?
duration.answer: A full diagnostic usually takes between 30 minutes and 1 hour, depending on the complexity of the problem.

vehicles.question: What types of vehicles do you diagnose?
vehicles.answer: We diagnose all types of vehicles: passenger cars, commercial vehicles, all brands.

warranty.question: Do you offer a warranty on repairs?
warranty.answer: Yes, all our repairs are covered by a warranty of at least 6 months.

brands.question: Do you accept vehicles of all brands?
brands.answer: We work on most car brands, whether they run on petrol, diesel, or electricity.

appointment.title: Diagnostic Request
appointment.subtitle: Schedule an appointment for a complete diagnostic of your vehicle. Our specialized technicians will use the latest diagnostic tools to precisely identify the cause of problems.

symptoms.label: Observed Symptoms
symptoms.placeholder: Describe the symptoms or problems you've noticed

repair.title: Car Repair
repair.subtitle: Thorough repairs of damage and defects

intro.description1: At Global Car Services, we know cars inside out. Our experienced experts tackle every breakdown, from mechanical to electronic.
intro.description2: With the best tools, we quickly find what's wrong and fix it. We ensure your car can get back on the road safely as soon as possible.

engine.title: Engine Repair
engine.description: Intervention for all types of engine failures, from simple maintenance to complex repairs

gearbox.title: Gearbox
gearbox.description: Diagnosis and repair of manual and automatic gearboxes

brakes.title: Braking System
brakes.description: Repair and replacement of braking system components

cost.question: How much does a repair cost?
cost.answer: The cost depends on the nature of the breakdown. We perform an accurate diagnosis and provide you with a detailed quote before intervening.

duration.question: What is the repair time?
duration.answer: The repair time depends on the complexity of the problem. We strive to repair your vehicle as quickly as possible without compromising the quality of our service.

warranty.question: Do you offer a warranty on repairs?
warranty.answer: Yes, all our repairs are covered by a warranty of at least 6 months.

brands.question: Do you accept vehicles of all brands?
brands.answer: We work on most car brands, whether they run on petrol, diesel, or electricity.

appointment.title: Repair Request
appointment.subtitle: Schedule an appointment for a repair of your vehicle. Our qualified technicians will use the latest repair tools to precisely identify the cause of problems.

intro.description1: At Global Car Services, we offer a complete overhaul service to ensure the optimal operation of your vehicle. Our qualified technicians perform a thorough inspection of all essential components.
intro.description2: Regular overhauls are essential to extend the life of your vehicle and avoid costly repairs. Trust our expertise for a complete and professional overhaul.

inspection.title: Complete Inspection
inspection.description: Thorough check of all mechanical and electronic systems

performance.title: Performance Check
performance.description: Evaluation of engine, transmission, and brake performance

safety.title: Safety Check
safety.description: Inspection of safety elements like brakes, tires, suspension, and lighting

emissions.title: Emissions Check
emissions.description: Check of the exhaust system and emission levels to ensure compliance with environmental standards

frequency.question: How often should I have an overhaul?
frequency.answer: We recommend a complete overhaul every 20,000 to 30,000 km or every two years, whichever comes first. The frequency may vary depending on the model, age of the vehicle, and your driving habits.

difference.question: What's the difference between maintenance and overhaul?
difference.answer: Maintenance involves regular operations like oil changes or filter replacements. Overhaul is more comprehensive and includes a thorough inspection of all vehicle systems, with replacement of worn parts if necessary.

preparation.question: How do I prepare my vehicle for an overhaul?
preparation.answer: No special preparation is needed. However, it's useful to note any problems or unusual behavior you've noticed so our technicians can pay special attention to them.

report.question: Will I receive a detailed report after the overhaul?
report.answer: Yes, after each overhaul, you'll receive a detailed report with the status of each checked component, the work performed, and our recommendations for future interventions if needed.

hero.title: Rental Conditions
hero.subtitle: All important information about renting our vehicles

general.title: General Conditions
general.subtitle: Important information for renting your vehicle

driver.title: Driver Requirements
driver.content:
• Valid European B driver's license (no provisional license)
• Minimum 2 years of license or 25 years old
• Copy of ID and driver's license required
• Additional drivers possible with extra charge

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.content:
• Valid ID
• Valid European driver's license
• Credit card in the name of the main driver
• Signed rental agreement

payment.title: Payment and Deposit
payment.content:
• Deposit via credit card block
• Refund after vehicle check
• Invoices payable on due date
• In case of damage: flat-rate compensation of €500 per damage case

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.content:
• Third-party liability insurance included
• Deductible in case of damage
• Optional extensions:
  - Deductible reduction
  - Driver insurance
  - Tire and glass protection

usage.title: Usage Conditions
usage.content:
• Use as a good family man
• Prohibitions:
  - Smoking or vaping
  - Animals (except in a closed carrier)
  - Driving off paved roads
• Tank at least 1/4 full at return
• Return vehicle clean

mileage.title: Mileage
mileage.content:
Included kilometers:
• Half day: 75 km
• Day: 200 km
• Weekend: 400 km
• 5 days: 750 km
• Week: 1000 km

Extra charge per additional km:
• Vans: 0.21€
• Minibus: 0.19€
• Refrigerated vehicles: 0.28€

accident.title: In Case of Accident
accident.content:
• Immediately inform GLOBAL CAR SERVICES
• Notify police if necessary
• Stay on site until advised otherwise
• Do not admit liability
• Note contact details of other parties

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Modification
cancellation.content:
• Cancellation: 40% of total amount as compensation
• Modifications possible with extra charges
• Late return: 50% surcharge on daily rate
• Traffic fines will be charged

basic.title: Basic Coverage
basic.description: All our vehicles are third-party liability insured. In case of damage, a deductible applies.

late.title: Late Return
late.description: Any delay in returning the vehicle will be charged at the daily rate plus 50%.

traffic.title: Traffic Violations
traffic.description: Fines and costs related to traffic violations are the responsibility of the renter.

pickup.question: Can I pick up the vehicle at another time?
pickup.answer: Yes, we offer flexible pickup and return times. Contact us to schedule an appointment outside regular opening hours.

damage.question: What happens if the vehicle is damaged?
damage.answer: In case of damage, a flat-rate compensation of €500 per damage case applies. The deductible is deducted from the deposit. Major damages are handled by the insurance company. For tire damage, you are responsible for repair or replacement.

extension.question: Can I extend the rental period?
extension.answer: Yes, extension is possible if the vehicle is available. Contact us as early as possible to arrange the extension.

included.question: What is included in the rental price?
included.answer: The rental price includes: third-party liability insurance, mileage according to chosen formula, 24/7 breakdown service, and a clean, fueled car at pickup.

insurance.question: Am I insured for all damage?
insurance.answer: The vehicle is third-party liability insured with a deductible. You can opt for additional insurances like deductible reduction, driver insurance, and tire and glass protection. Note: damage due to non-compliance with height restrictions or off-road driving is not covered by insurance.

hero.title: Contact

info.title: Contact Information
info.subtitle: Feel free to contact us by phone, email, or by visiting one of our offices.

intro.paragraph1: Car trouble never comes at a good time. That's why our breakdown service is available day and night. We'll send an experienced mechanic to you, whether you're at home, on the road, or on the highway. One phone call and we'll get you back on the road.
intro.paragraph2: Our team of professional mechanics responds quickly to all types of breakdowns, whether on the road, highway, or at home. Just remember one number for immediate help.

towing.title: Towing Service
towing.description: Professional towing service for all types of vehicles

battery.title: Battery Service
battery.description: Quick intervention for battery problems and jump-start

fuel.title: Fuel Delivery
fuel.description: Emergency fuel delivery to your breakdown location

response.question: What is the response time?
response.answer: Our team usually arrives within 30 to 45 minutes, depending on your location.

area.question: What is the service area?
area.answer: We operate throughout the Antwerp region and surrounding areas, on roads and highways.

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: We give you a fixed rate before we intervene. Payment can be made by card or cash.

highway.question: What to do in case of a breakdown on the highway?
highway.answer: Ensure your safety, turn on your hazard lights, place your warning triangle, and call us immediately.

form.title: Assistance Request
form.subtitle: Call us in case of emergency at {phone}. For non-urgent requests, you can use the form below.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: From passion to professional custom service

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: In 2013, Samir started with one lift and a clear belief: if you work honestly and master your craft, success will follow. Under the name RS Cars, he built something bigger step by step.
story.paragraph2: What began as a one-man business has today grown into a professional garage and rental service. We combine years of experience with personal service and continue to invest in quality, both in our team and our infrastructure.

mission.title: What Drives Us
mission.description: We believe quality is no accident. Every vehicle that comes to us gets our full attention. We work efficiently, communicate clearly, and think in solutions. Quick switching is standard.

personal.title: Personal Contact
personal.description: We believe in personal service and direct communication with our customers.

technicians.title: Experienced Technicians
technicians.description: Our team consists of qualified professionals with years of experience.

speed.title: Quick Follow-Up
speed.description: We work efficiently and communicate clearly about the progress of your request.

prices.title: Affordable Prices
prices.description: Quality service at fair and transparent prices.

page.title: Make an Appointment
page.subtitle: Easily schedule an appointment online for maintenance, repair, or inspection
page.iframe_title: Make an Appointment - Global Car Service

questions.title: Have Questions?
